name: VestaCP Concept
description:
I've been working with VestaCP a long time. Maybe it's not the best Control Panel I've ever seen, but it's one of the best open source alternatives I know.


So after a lot of time spent on configure my domains and connections on my server, I've decided to make a concept of how VestaCP would look like, if it was darker and minimalistic with graphics just starting.

Hope you liked, sorry for my english c':
